    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client
    Provides HBase Client Table of Contents Overview Example API Usage Overview To administer HBase, create and drop tables, list and alter tables, use Admin.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.locking  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor
    Table of Contents Overview Coprocessor RegionObserver Endpoint Coprocessor loading Overview Coprocessors are code that runs in-process on each region server.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc
    Tools to help define network clients and servers.

    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.snapshot

    Multi Cluster Replication Cluster replication documentation has been moved to the link:http://hbase.apache.org/book.html#_cluster_replication[Cluster Replication] section of the link:http://hbase.apache.org/book.html[Apache HBase Reference Guide].

      Defines a curated set of shared functions implemented by HBase servers (Masters and RegionServers).

      限定符和类型 类和说明

      Wraps a Connection to make it can't be closed or aborted.

      Implementation of a file cleaner that checks if an hfile is still referenced by backup before deleting it from hfile archive directory.

    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client中Abortable的使用

      org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client中Abortable的子接口 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      interface  Admin
      The administrative API for HBase.
      interface  ClusterConnection
      Internal methods on Connection that should not be used by user code.
      interface  Connection
      A cluster connection encapsulating lower level individual connections to actual servers and a connection to zookeeper.
      实现Abortable的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      (专用程序包) class  ConnectionImplementation
      Main implementation of Connection and ClusterConnection interfaces.
      (专用程序包) static class  ConnectionUtils.MasterlessConnection
      Some tests shut down the master.
      static class  ConnectionUtils.ShortCircuitingClusterConnection
      A ClusterConnection that will short-circuit RPC making direct invocations against the localhost if the invocation target is 'this' server; save on network and protobuf invocations.
      class  HBaseAdmin
      HBaseAdmin is no longer a client API.
      private static class  HBaseAdmin.ThrowableAbortable
      Simple Abortable, throwing RuntimeException on abort.

    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.locking中Abortable的使用

      声明为Abortable的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.locking中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private Abortable EntityLock.abort 
      参数类型为Abortable的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.locking中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      EntityLock LockServiceClient.namespaceLock(String namespace, String description, Abortable abort)
      LocCreate a new EntityLock object to acquire exclusive lock on a namespace.
      EntityLock LockServiceClient.regionLock(List<RegionInfo> regionInfos, String description, Abortable abort)
      Create a new EntityLock object to acquire exclusive lock on multiple regions of same tables.
      EntityLock LockServiceClient.tableLock(TableName tableName, boolean exclusive, String description, Abortable abort)
      Create a new EntityLock object to acquire an exclusive or shared lock on a table.
      参数类型为Abortable的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.locking中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      EntityLock(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.LockServiceProtos.LockService.BlockingInterface stub, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.LockServiceProtos.LockRequest request, Abortable abort)
      Abortable.abort() is called when the lease of the lock will expire.
